root.name: FireTrap
root.description: In Firetrap, the player controls a firefighter climbing up skyscraper that is going up in flames. The player has to dodge falling object and steer clear of the flames. The hero also carries a water cannon with which the flames can be extinguished. Climb the burning skyscrapers and dodge the falling bricks, cars, glass and obstacles to rescue the people trapped inside. And watch out - it's a long fall to the street!
